t: Amazon Trade-In: Get Paid for Your Used Items
s: Amazon accepts a wide variety of electronics for trade-in. This includes eligible Amazon devices, as well as eligible devices from various other brands, including smartphones, tablets, and video games.

t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon
s: Your trademark text must match the brand name on your Brand Registry application. If your trademark is an image-based mark with words, letters, or numbers, you will need to upload a copy of the image during enrollment.

t: Sell more with the New Seller Guide
s: The New Seller Guide is a set of brand, logistics, pricing, and promotional services that we recommend to sellers who are just getting started with Amazon. Brand Registry, At Content, Vine, Automate Pricing, Fulfillment by Amazon (FBA), and Advertising are backed by data science and designed ...

t: Amazon Trade-In Terms and Conditions - Amazon Customer Service
s: Find more solutions · Items we accept will be purchased from you, and you will be paid for the items with an Amazon.com Gift Card(s) issued for the value of your trade-in (subject to adjustment as noted below in the Downgrades, Trade-In Value and Instant Payment sections).

The trademark applications indicated that the label would be used for textiles, kitchen utensils, and other household goods.

t: Amazon Transparency: Counterfeit and brand protection
s: Transparency protects your brand and customers from counterfeits by ensuring that every unit shipped is authentic. Learn more about Amazon Transparency.
